com.mele.games.animation

Class AnimationImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mele.games.animation.AnimationImage

  • public class AnimationImage
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a specific picture to be used in a sequence of animations for a sprite.

    Ayar
